pci_projects_project_edit_remove_please_: Important: Please note that all of your services, resources, settings and data will be destroyed, without any option to restore at a later date. The only exception to this is failover IPs, which will be parked.
pci_projects_project_edit_remove_error: An error has occurred deleting the project: {{ error }}.
pci_projects_project_edit_remove_success: You have been sent an email confirming the deletion.
pci_projects_project_discovery_edit_remo: Please note that deleting your project cannot be undone. To use the Public Cloud solutions again, you’ll need to recreate one from scratch.
pci_projects_project_discovery_edit_savi: You already have a Savings Plan for this project. You cannot delete it. To delete this Savings plan, please reach out to Customer Support.
